sentences.en: "That is beautiful, Tony," Momma said, no longer sounding at all snappish.
sentences.cn: “真美呀，托尼，”妈妈说道，话音里的恶声恶气不见了。

sentences.en: "Tony, I can explain everything," she said tensely.
sentences.cn: “托尼，这一切我都可以解释，”她紧张地说。

sentences.en: I had almost decided to keep my rendezvous with Tony.
sentences.cn: 我差不多已经决定如约和托尼见面了。

sentences.en: Richard had turned up on Christmas Eve with Tony.
sentences.cn: 理查德和托尼在圣诞夜一道露面了。

sentences.en: That's certainly very generous of you Tony.
Tony also built his own house from his own plans.
sentences.cn: 托尼还自己设计并盖好了房子。

sentences.en: Tony announced it was time to see about lunch.
Tony built his own house and laid his own drains.
sentences.cn: 托尼自己盖了房子并铺设了下水管道。

sentences.en: Tony didn't notice because he was too engrossed in his work.
sentences.cn: 托尼因为太专注于自己的工作而毫未察觉。

sentences.en: Tony drank some coffee before he continued.
sentences.cn: 托尼喝了点咖啡继续说。

sentences.en: Tony has now been thrust into the limelight, with a high-profile job.
sentences.cn: 托尼现在一下子成了众人关注的中心，因为他有一份经常出镜、见报的工作。
托尼看起来很疲惫而且过分焦虑。

sentences.en: Tony smiled and lifted his glass. "Here's to you, Amy."
sentences.cn: 托尼微笑着举起杯子。“为你干一杯，埃米。”

sentences.en: Tony was unnerved by the uncanny familiarity of her face.
sentences.cn: 怪异的是，她看起来竟有些面熟，这让托尼心慌意乱。

sentences.en: Tony Woodcock has joined German amateur team SC Brueck as coach.
sentences.cn: 托尼·伍德科克加盟德国业余队SC布吕克队担任教练。

sentences.en: We met in a tony restaurant uptown.
sentences.cn: 我们在市郊一家豪华的饭店见面。

words.tran_cn: 时髦的，漂亮的；贵族化的

phrases.tran_cn: n. 安胜浩（韩国男歌星）
梁朝伟（香港知名男演员）
